moves.3... Nc6: This is not usual for this opening
moves.8... O-O: Castling into an attack is probably not a good idea
moves.9. Nf3: Mounting the attack on the king-side...
moves.9... h6: Preventing N-g5 (which would be devastating for black)
moves.11... Nxf4: Black falls into the trap head-first
moves.12. Qe3 g5 13. hxg5 hxg5: The h-file is now free for attack
moves.14. O-O-O: This is to free up the f1 Bishop without having to be afraid of g2
moves.14... Ne7: Moving another knight into the defence
moves.15. Bd3: Getting another piece into the attack
moves.18. Rdh1: Getting another rook into the attack

players: Rune Bang Frederiksen  vs. Søren Lassen
